narrative.title: Superga Division - 1943Q2
narrative.situation: Italian Assault and Landing Infantry Division deployed in North Africa during 1943Q2.
narrative.objectives: Assault and landing division trained for combined operations and amphibious warfare. Specialized in mountain warfare and assault tactics.
narrative.axis_objective: Maintain defensive positions and inflict maximum casualties on Allied forces.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and secure strategic objectives while minimizing casualties.

weather.terrain: Tunisia: mixed terrain - coastal plains, rocky hills, wadis, mountainous regions (Medjerda Valley, Enfidaville position)

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Amphibious assault training (Leghorn combined operations center)
Decentralized heavy weapons for independent battalion operations
